mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SPECIAL FEATURES "Thoughts for a New Year", "What's Being Danced?", "Hoedown and Drums in Morocco", "Additional Terminology and Companion Movements to the First Twenty Basics", "Americana: Katie and the Cowhide", "Round Dancing: A Thoughtful Approach", "Home for Square Dancing", "What'll You Have - Publicity or Public Relations?", "Descriptive Wording of Square Dance Calls", and "Random Notes from Connecticut's Dance History". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "Square Dance Date Book", "From the Floor", "As I See It", "Chuck Jones' Note Book", "The Square Dance Picture", "Round the Outside Ring", "Caller of the Month: Max Engle", "Paging the Roundancers: The Leons", "Ladies on the Square: Petticoat Carrier", "What They're Wearing", and "On the Record".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
